original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields open steady, rupee at 321.60/90 against the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at open on Thursday, while the rupee opened at 321.60/90 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted at 28.25/75 percent on Thursday, steady from 28.30/60 percent at Wednesday’s close.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 27.00/30 percent, slightly up from 26.60/90 percent yesterday. (Colombo/April27/2023)
